description:
“The first 1000 people to use this link will get a free trial of Skillshare Premium Membership: https://skl.sh/blackmagiccraft3

ESSENTIAL EQUIPMENT: http://bit.ly/EssentialEquip
JOIN the "FELLOWSHIP" on PATREON: http://bit.ly/JoinTheBMC_Fellowship
OFFICIAL BMC MERCH: http://bit.ly/BMCmerch

#BlackMagicCraft #Episode127 #ART

Wow, this one was a blast. I havn't tried making "traditional" art in a very long time, and despite my limited ability I'm really happy with how this turned out.

Thanks to Skillshare for sponsoring this video.

If you want to get a print, sticker, phone case, mask with this cool original plague boy art on it you can grab something here: http://bit.ly/PlagueBoy

Thanks to @Jazza for sending me one of his creativity boxes to try. 
Check them: https://smartartbox.com/pages/jazzaboxes

title: What happens when I try "real" ART with @Jazza's Creativity BOX?
